resources.string: When this service is enabled it lets Dot safe app to display notifications and indicators every time a third-party app or a service uses camera or microphone on any screen.
Turn this on to enable safe-dots
Disable the accessibility permission to the app
You will get a short vibration whenever an application or a service uses microphone or camera
Align the dots in the way you want and you are comfortable with
This will clear all the logs which cannot be recovered back.\nStill want to proceed ?
Made for you by Aravind Chowdary
Timeline of app usage logs. You can find which app used your camera and mic at what intervals.
